overview:
Chief Experiences Officer & Co-Founder @ tripXP

tripXP.com is an online marketplace for experiences and activities all around the world. People from all over the world can discover, buy, sell and propose unique travel experiences and activities. Everything is made online, from the discovery of an activity to the booking and the payment, with tripXP.com.

A secure way, either for the guide or the tourist, to live extra-ordinary experiences all over the world.

The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Paris, France, the first touristic city and country in the world!

———————————

CEO & Co-Founder @ EDOLONE

Alternative marketing specialists. Trade Marketing, Events (consumers, press, bloggers & vips), Community Management & Web.

Clients: Nintendo, Microsoft, Sony PlayStation, Activision Blizzard, Ubisoft, Electronic Arts, Renault, Dacia, PizzaHut, Heineken, Brasseries Kronenbourg, FNAC, Nikon, Canon…

Portfolio:

  • Nintendo Mall Tours (2009, 2010, 2011)
  • Electronic Arts, Unibail Rodamco Mall Tours (2008>2010)
  • Fnac In Store Events (2004>2011) : TropheeFnac
  • Activision Blizzard World of Warcraft & Call of Duty Midnight Openings in Paris, France
  • Assassin’s Creed Launch Event in Paris, France
  • Morocco Community Management for Dacia & Renault
